title: Old Navy Tee Block Condensed Font
content:
Trying to find the Block Condensed font used on this Old Navy TShirt.  
I've found plenty of close matches but not the exact font. I'm guessing this font has been rounded so I've taken that into account. Thanks for any suggestions.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822154203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OldNavyBlockCond_5645.JPG)
author: sagtucket

comments.content:
B-52 is very similar (minus the rounded edges):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/stockbucket/b-52/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822154203/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/stockbucket/b-52/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/stockbucket/b-52/")

Closest I was able to come to letter forms and width to height ratio is Prohibition [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822154203/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition/")  
This might be a proprietary alphabet.  
Don
